text: Aubenas is a city and commune in the southern part of the Ardèche département. The Ardèche River flows through the commune. ==Twin towns== Aubenas is twinned with: * Cesenatico, Italy * Delfzijl, Netherlands * Schwarzenbeck, Germany * Sierre, Switzerland * Zelzate, Belgium * Palamos, Spain (friendship agreement) ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ardèche department ==Other websites== * Town council website * Tourism office website Category:Communes in Ardèche Aubenas
title: Aubenas
